import React from 'react' import { Col, Card, Image, Row, Button } from 'react-bootstrap' import star from '../accets/star.jpg' import { Context } from '../index' import productTemplate from '../accets/product_img.jpg' import { useHistory } from 'react-router' import { PRODUCT_ROUTE } from '../utils/consts' const ProductItem = ({ product, role }) => { const history = useHistory() const height = role === 'ADMIN' ? '28rem' : '25rem' return ( history.push(PRODUCT_ROUTE + '/' + product.id)} style={{ width: '15rem', height: { height } }} className='m-2 text-center cardStyle'> {product.name}

{`${product.price} p.`}

 {role === 'ADMIN' ? : ''} ) } export default ProductItem;
